Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_BEATMAP: This command allows you to capture information from a beatmap{l}Just enter the beatmap ID.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_RECENTUSER: This command allows you to show recently played beatmaps.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_TOPUSER: This command is possible to view the best statistics of a player.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_USER: Check a player's information{l}Entering username or ID.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_LANGUAGE: Change the bot language!{l}You can switch to other languages.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_PLAYERS: Check who is playing osu!{l}You can see who is playing on this server.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_RANKING: See the world ranking of osu!
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_SEARCH: Pesquise beatmaps pelo bot!{l}A pesquisa não será precisa.
Help.OSU_HELPMESSAGE_USERIMAGE: Check a player's information{l}Entering username or ID.
Help.HELPMESSAGE_EMBED: This command is used to create simple embedding.
Help.HELPMESSAGE_HELP: See available commands or help menus for each command.
Help.HELPMESSAGE_INVITE: Invite me to your server{l} or get to know me more closely!
Help.HELPMESSAGE_VOTE: Vote for me so that more people know me!
Help.HELPMESSAGE_VERSION: Check the bot version and more.
Help.INSUFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: Insufficient Permission{l}You are not allowed to run this command.
Help.NO_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION: No description has been defined for this command.
Help.PREFIX_HELP: Hey, this looks wrong :p{l} If you want help, type the command ou!help

Messages.INVITE_COMMAND_MESSAGE: I can be part of your discord server{l}Just [Click here]({InviteUrl}) to Invite me!{l}{l}If you want support or know me a little more{l}Try my discord server! - [Ou!su Bot]({BotDiscordUrl})
Messages.VERSION_COMMAND_MESSAGE: {emoji1} Ou!su is a Discord Bot programmed in the Java programming language{l}This Java application uses the Osu API officially available via ppy. (API in java created by me){l}{l}{emoji2} Created on
Messages.HELP_COMMAND_MESSAGE: Command List{l}:white_small_square:These are the commands available in Ousu Bot,{l}If you have questions about how to use them{l}  {l}:white_small_square: Enter ou!help <command> for the commands {l}to be specified
Messages.LANGUAGE_COMMAND_MESSAGE: :earth_americas: Changed language{l}Bot language on this server has been successfully changed
Messages.PREFIX_COMMAND_MESSAGE: New Prefix!{l}The server prefix was changed successfully{l}Old prefix{l}New Prefix
Messages.PREFIX_INCORRECT_USE: Incorrect Use{l}it is necessary to have a special character{l}[!,@,# etc]
Messages.GLOBAL_RANKING_MESSAGE: You are viewing a global ranking of osu!
Messages.NATIONAL_RANKING_MESSAGE: You are viewing the classification by country{l}The country you are seeing now is {country}
Messages.PREFIX_INCORRECT_USE2: Incorrect Use{l}Only 3 characters are allowed.{l}*[ex: ou!]*
Messages.INEXISTENT_COMMAND_HELP: Command doesn't exist{l}This command in which you requested help does not exist!
Messages.VOTE_COMMAND_MESSAGE: Vote for me!{l}Hello {user} I’m Ousu, a bot with lots of cool features about {logo} it is very difficult to live in this internet world, especially when you are a robot! :smirk_cat: and like all robot I want to take over the world! Just kidding haha!{l} {l}If you want to help me, vote for me for more people to know me.That way you don't pay anything and it still helps me a lot :3
